document.full_text: kazuko yamashita was five when the atom bomb was dropped on nagasaki, destroying her home in a second and leaving her with a lifelong fear that every time she becomes ill, this time it is finally cancer.
document.title: nagasaki survivor calmly waits out nuclear crisis in tokyo
lines_and_colors: kazuko yamashita was five when the atom bomb was dropped on nagasaki, destroying her home in a second and leaving her with a lifelong fear that every time she becomes ill, this time it is finally cancer.
